item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-08
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Zaftig's Delicatessen (335 Harvard St, Brookline). #
  • Breakfast Sandwich @ Zaftigs #
  • RT: Web developers who want to see future versions of Internet Explorer succeed must be suffering from Stockholm sydrome. (via @aral) #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
